model.name: endpointTransformer
model.title: Endpoint Transformer
model.description: To use a Camel endpoint to perform transformation on the route level.
model.label: transformation

ref.description: Set the reference of the Endpoint.

uri.description: Set the URI of the Endpoint.

scheme.description: Set a scheme name supported by the transformer. If you specify 'csv', the transformer will be picked up for all of 'csv' from/to Java transformation. Note that the scheme matching is performed only when no exactly matched transformer exists.

name.description: Set the transformer name under which the transformer gets referenced when specifying the input/output data type on routes. If you specify a transformer name that matches a data type scheme like 'csv' the transformer will be picked up for all of 'csv:' from/to Java transformation. Note that the scheme matching is performed only when no exactly matched transformer exists.

fromType.description: Set the 'from' data type name. If you specify 'xml:XYZ', the transformer will be picked up if source type is 'xml:XYZ'. If you specify just 'xml', the transformer matches with all of 'xml' source type like 'xml:ABC' or 'xml:DEF'.

toType.description: Set the 'to' data type name. If you specify 'json:XYZ', the transformer will be picked up if destination type is 'json:XYZ'. If you specify just 'json', the transformer matches with all of 'json' destination type like 'json:ABC' or 'json:DEF'.
